nodes.text: Fourth class (class 4) droids, also known as fourth-degree droids, were droids skilled in security and military functions.
Fourth-degree models included Baktoid Combat Automata's B2-series super battle droids, tactical droids, and BX-series droid commandos, all of which were classed as battle droids.

Most fourth class droids were not programmed to speak and interact with organic beings. The KX-series security droid was an exception, though it was not proficient when compared with a protocol droid, whose capabilities were similar to that of the T-series and its successor, both Confederacy tactical droids.
